rows.label: qev085501_MSG0000
rows.name: Colonel? And everyone's here with you! Perfect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0001
rows.name: Hmm, why do I feel like we're about to be asked for a favor...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0002
rows.name: Nooo... I mean, yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0003
rows.name: Gwin has desperate and pleading look on face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Let Tatsu guess: Gwin is dying of hunger
and want Linly to make big dessert for us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0005
rows.name: Not even close, Shorty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0006
rows.name: Well, if you're in a place like this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_JNK0010
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev085501_SEL0011
rows.name: Assume his problem is combat-related.

rows.label: qev085501_JNK0020
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: qev085501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if he's having lady trouble.

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0007
rows.name: Exactly. I need to get stronger. Be a better soldier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0008
rows.name: Exactly. I need toâ€”wait, what?! No![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0009
rows.name: I'm here because I want to get stronger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0010
rows.name: C'mon, Gwin, you're plenty tough already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0011
rows.name: But I need to be tougher! I'm still nowhere near Leon's level.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0012
rows.name: Who's Leon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0013
rows.name:
Now I get it... All right, so how can we help?
You're looking for some advice?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0014
rows.name: Yes, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0015
rows.name:
Before we can say anything useful,
we'll need to get a feel for your current abilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0016
rows.name: Let's start with a round of mock combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0017
rows.name: What?! But...you'll mop the floor with me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0018
rows.name: It's an exercise, Gwin. It's not about winning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0019
rows.name: Exactly. Now get ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085501_MSG0020
rows.name: Well...all right. I'll give it my best, ma'am![ST:wait ]
